column4: Hello, for some reason gmail is not working with firefox 3.0.3 in ubuntu, but works fine on the same browser version in mac and vista, suggestions
you wouldn't happen to have noscript installed in ubuntu would you? if not, try clearing your cache
i do have noscript installed, but it still does not work when i disable noscript globally
maybe run firefox from a console .. does it come up with any errors?
